alias_zhh: 揼時間；拖延時間​；捱時間；拖拖拉拉；磨时间
chs: 拖延时间/耽误时间/磨洋工/拖拖拉拉
en: Delay/waste time/drag it out/drag things out/play for time/run down the clock/stonewall/slow walk/string someone along
note_chs: 形容词：磨洋工，不在积极，故意拖长时间，
note_en: adj: Slow down and waste time
variants_chs: 用法：无心工作，不上进的状态
variants_en: usage: A lack of motivation and drive at work.

note_chs: 动词：扔东西，往外扔，有力量
note_en: v: Throwing things, throwing them outwards, has power.
variants_chs: 用法：当你想用很洒脱去形容“扔”这个动作
variants_en: usage: When you want to describe the action of "throwing" as very carefree...

chs: 扔东西过来/丢东西过来
en: toss it over here/throw it over here
note_chs: 动词：用很快速度扔了过来，已经进行中，在空中
note_en: v: It was thrown over at high speed; it was already in progress, in the air.
variants_chs: 用法：当你想用很快的速度去形容“扔”这个动作
variants_en: usage: When you want to describe the action of "throwing" as very fast...

note_chs: 动词：推动 吴卓羲标志名言“唔好ong”，不要推的意思
variants_chs: 用法：在推动，被推，推某些东西特指”推“这个字或者动作
variants_en: usage: In the context of pushing, being pushed, or pushing something, the word "push" or the action of pushing is specifically used.
